02063                 LASSERT(msg->msg_md == NULL);
02064                 LASSERT(msg->msg_rx_delayed);
02065                 LASSERT(msg->msg_rxpeer != NULL);
02066                 LASSERT(msg->msg_hdr.type == LNET_MSG_PUT);
02067 
02068                 CWARN("Dropping delayed PUT from %s portal %d match "LPU64
02069                       " offset %d length %d: %s\n",
02070                       libcfs_id2str(id),
02071                       msg->msg_hdr.msg.put.ptl_index,
02072                       msg->msg_hdr.msg.put.match_bits,
02073                       msg->msg_hdr.msg.put.offset,
02074                       msg->msg_hdr.payload_length, reason);
02075 
02076                 /* NB I can't drop msg's ref on msg_rxpeer until after I've
02077                  * called lnet_drop_message(), so I just hang onto msg as well
02078                  * until that's done */
02079 
02080                 lnet_drop_message(msg->msg_rxpeer->lp_ni,
02081                                   msg->msg_rxpeer->lp_cpt,
02082                                   msg->msg_private, msg->msg_len);
02083                 /*
02084                  * NB: message will not generate event because w/o attached MD,
02085                  * but we still should give error code so lnet_msg_decommit()
02086                  * can skip counters operations and other checks.
02087                  */
02088                 lnet_finalize(msg->msg_rxpeer->lp_ni, msg, -ENOENT);
02089         }
02090 }
02091 
02092 void
02093 lnet_recv_delayed_msg_list(struct list_head *head)
02094 {
02095         while (!list_empty(head)) {
02096                 lnet_msg_t        *msg;
02097                 lnet_process_id_t  id;
02098 
02099                 msg = list_entry(head->next, lnet_msg_t, msg_list);
02100                 list_del(&msg->msg_list);
02101 
02102                 /* md won't disappear under me, since each msg
02103                  * holds a ref on it */
02104 
02105                 id.nid = msg->msg_hdr.src_nid;
02106                 id.pid = msg->msg_hdr.src_pid;
02107 
02108                 LASSERT(msg->msg_rx_delayed);
02109                 LASSERT(msg->msg_md != NULL);
02110                 LASSERT(msg->msg_rxpeer != NULL);
02111                 LASSERT(msg->msg_hdr.type == LNET_MSG_PUT);
02112 
02113                 CDEBUG(D_NET, "Resuming delayed PUT from %s portal %d "
02114                        "match "LPU64" offset %d length %d.\n",
02115                         libcfs_id2str(id), msg->msg_hdr.msg.put.ptl_index,
02116                         msg->msg_hdr.msg.put.match_bits,
02117                         msg->msg_hdr.msg.put.offset,
02118                         msg->msg_hdr.payload_length);
02119 
02120                 lnet_recv_put(msg->msg_rxpeer->lp_ni, msg);
02121         }
02122 }
02123 
02168 int
02169 LNetPut(lnet_nid_t self, lnet_handle_md_t mdh, lnet_ack_req_t ack,
02170         lnet_process_id_t target, unsigned int portal,
02171         __u64 match_bits, unsigned int offset,
02172         __u64 hdr_data)
02173 {
02174         struct lnet_msg         *msg;
02175         struct lnet_libmd       *md;
02176         int                     cpt;
02177         int                     rc;
02178 
02179         LASSERT(the_lnet.ln_refcount > 0);
02180 
02181         if (!list_empty(&the_lnet.ln_test_peers) &&     /* normally we don't */
02182             fail_peer(target.nid, 1)) {                 /* shall we now? */
02183                 CERROR("Dropping PUT to %s: simulated failure\n",
02184                        libcfs_id2str(target));
02185                 return -EIO;
02186         }
02187 
02188         msg = lnet_msg_alloc();
02189         if (msg == NULL) {
02190                 CERROR("Dropping PUT to %s: ENOMEM on lnet_msg_t\n",
02191                        libcfs_id2str(target));
02192                 return -ENOMEM;
02193         }
02194         msg->msg_vmflush = !!memory_pressure_get();
02195 
02196         cpt = lnet_cpt_of_cookie(mdh.cookie);
02197         lnet_res_lock(cpt);
02198 
02199         md = lnet_handle2md(&mdh);
02200         if (md == NULL || md->md_threshold == 0 || md->md_me != NULL) {
02201                 CERROR("Dropping PUT ("LPU64":%d:%s): MD (%d) invalid\n",
02202                        match_bits, portal, libcfs_id2str(target),
02203                        md == NULL ? -1 : md->md_threshold);
02204                 if (md != NULL && md->md_me != NULL)
02205                         CERROR("Source MD also attached to portal %d\n",
02206                                md->md_me->me_portal);
02207                 lnet_res_unlock(cpt);
02208 
02209                 lnet_msg_free(msg);
02210                 return -ENOENT;
02211         }
02212 
02213         CDEBUG(D_NET, "LNetPut -> %s\n", libcfs_id2str(target));
02214 
02215         lnet_msg_attach_md(msg, md, 0, 0);
02216 
02217         lnet_prep_send(msg, LNET_MSG_PUT, target, 0, md->md_length);
02218 
02219         msg->msg_hdr.msg.put.match_bits = cpu_to_le64(match_bits);
02220         msg->msg_hdr.msg.put.ptl_index = cpu_to_le32(portal);
02221         msg->msg_hdr.msg.put.offset = cpu_to_le32(offset);
02222         msg->msg_hdr.msg.put.hdr_data = hdr_data;
02223 
02224         /* NB handles only looked up by creator (no flips) */
02225         if (ack == LNET_ACK_REQ) {
02226                 msg->msg_hdr.msg.put.ack_wmd.wh_interface_cookie =
02227                         the_lnet.ln_interface_cookie;
02228                 msg->msg_hdr.msg.put.ack_wmd.wh_object_cookie =
02229                         md->md_lh.lh_cookie;
02230         } else {
02231                 msg->msg_hdr.msg.put.ack_wmd.wh_interface_cookie =
02232                         LNET_WIRE_HANDLE_COOKIE_NONE;
02233                 msg->msg_hdr.msg.put.ack_wmd.wh_object_cookie =
02234                         LNET_WIRE_HANDLE_COOKIE_NONE;
02235         }
02236 
02237         lnet_res_unlock(cpt);
02238 
02239         lnet_build_msg_event(msg, LNET_EVENT_SEND);
02240 
02241         rc = lnet_send(self, msg, LNET_NID_ANY);
02242         if (rc != 0) {
02243                 CNETERR( "Error sending PUT to %s: %d\n",
02244                        libcfs_id2str(target), rc);
02245                 lnet_finalize (NULL, msg, rc);
02246         }
02247 
02248         /* completion will be signalled by an event */
02249         return 0;
02250 }
02251 EXPORT_SYMBOL(LNetPut);
02252 
02253 lnet_msg_t *
02254 lnet_create_reply_msg (lnet_ni_t *ni, lnet_msg_t *getmsg)
02255 {
02256         /* The LND can DMA direct to the GET md (i.e. no REPLY msg).  This
02257          * returns a msg for the LND to pass to lnet_finalize() when the sink
02258          * data has been received.
02259          *
02260          * CAVEAT EMPTOR: 'getmsg' is the original GET, which is freed when
02261          * lnet_finalize() is called on it, so the LND must call this first */
02262 
02263         struct lnet_msg         *msg = lnet_msg_alloc();
02264         struct lnet_libmd       *getmd = getmsg->msg_md;
02265         lnet_process_id_t       peer_id = getmsg->msg_target;
02266         int                     cpt;
02267 
02268         LASSERT(!getmsg->msg_target_is_router);
02269         LASSERT(!getmsg->msg_routing);
02270 
02271         if (msg == NULL) {
02272                 CERROR("%s: Dropping REPLY from %s: can't allocate msg\n",
02273                        libcfs_nid2str(ni->ni_nid), libcfs_id2str(peer_id));
02274                 goto drop;
02275         }
02276 
02277         cpt = lnet_cpt_of_cookie(getmd->md_lh.lh_cookie);
02278         lnet_res_lock(cpt);
02279 
02280         LASSERT(getmd->md_refcount > 0);
02281 
02282         if (getmd->md_threshold == 0) {
02283                 CERROR ("%s: Dropping REPLY from %s for inactive MD %p\n",
02284                         libcfs_nid2str(ni->ni_nid), libcfs_id2str(peer_id),
02285                         getmd);
02286                 lnet_res_unlock(cpt);
02287                 goto drop;
02288         }
02289 
02290         LASSERT(getmd->md_offset == 0);
02291 
02292         CDEBUG(D_NET, "%s: Reply from %s md %p\n",
02293                libcfs_nid2str(ni->ni_nid), libcfs_id2str(peer_id), getmd);
02294 
02295         /* setup information for lnet_build_msg_event */
02296         msg->msg_from = peer_id.nid;
02297         msg->msg_type = LNET_MSG_GET; /* flag this msg as an "optimized" GET */
02298         msg->msg_hdr.src_nid = peer_id.nid;
02299         msg->msg_hdr.payload_length = getmd->md_length;
02300         msg->msg_receiving = 1; /* required by lnet_msg_attach_md */
02301 
02302         lnet_msg_attach_md(msg, getmd, getmd->md_offset, getmd->md_length);
02303         lnet_res_unlock(cpt);
02304 
02305         cpt = lnet_cpt_of_nid(peer_id.nid);
02306 
02307         lnet_net_lock(cpt);
02308         lnet_msg_commit(msg, cpt);
02309         lnet_net_unlock(cpt);
02310 
02311         lnet_build_msg_event(msg, LNET_EVENT_REPLY);
02312 
02313         return msg;
02314 
02315  drop:
02316         cpt = lnet_cpt_of_nid(peer_id.nid);
02317 
02318         lnet_net_lock(cpt);
02319         the_lnet.ln_counters[cpt]->drop_count++;
02320         the_lnet.ln_counters[cpt]->drop_length += getmd->md_length;
02321         lnet_net_unlock(cpt);
02322 
02323         if (msg != NULL)
02324                 lnet_msg_free(msg);
02325 
02326         return NULL;
02327 }
02328 EXPORT_SYMBOL(lnet_create_reply_msg);
02329 
02330 void
02331 lnet_set_reply_msg_len(lnet_ni_t *ni, lnet_msg_t *reply, unsigned int len)
02332 {
02333         /* Set the REPLY length, now the RDMA that elides the REPLY message has
02334          * completed and I know it. */
02335         LASSERT (reply != NULL);
02336         LASSERT (reply->msg_type == LNET_MSG_GET);
02337         LASSERT (reply->msg_ev.type == LNET_EVENT_REPLY);
02338 
02339         /* NB I trusted my peer to RDMA.  If she tells me she's written beyond
02340          * the end of my buffer, I might as well be dead. */
02341         LASSERT (len <= reply->msg_ev.mlength);
02342 
02343         reply->msg_ev.mlength = len;
02344 }
02345 EXPORT_SYMBOL(lnet_set_reply_msg_len);
02346 
02367 int
02368 LNetGet(lnet_nid_t self, lnet_handle_md_t mdh,
02369         lnet_process_id_t target, unsigned int portal,
02370         __u64 match_bits, unsigned int offset)
02371 {
02372         struct lnet_msg         *msg;
02373         struct lnet_libmd       *md;
02374         int                     cpt;
02375         int                     rc;
02376 
02377         LASSERT (the_lnet.ln_refcount > 0);
02378 
02379         if (!list_empty(&the_lnet.ln_test_peers) &&     /* normally we don't */
02380             fail_peer(target.nid, 1))                   /* shall we now? */
02381         {
02382                 CERROR("Dropping GET to %s: simulated failure\n",
02383                        libcfs_id2str(target));
02384                 return -EIO;
02385         }
02386 
02387         msg = lnet_msg_alloc();
02388         if (msg == NULL) {
02389                 CERROR("Dropping GET to %s: ENOMEM on lnet_msg_t\n",
02390                        libcfs_id2str(target));
02391                 return -ENOMEM;
02392         }
02393 
02394         cpt = lnet_cpt_of_cookie(mdh.cookie);
02395         lnet_res_lock(cpt);
02396 
02397         md = lnet_handle2md(&mdh);
02398         if (md == NULL || md->md_threshold == 0 || md->md_me != NULL) {
02399                 CERROR("Dropping GET ("LPU64":%d:%s): MD (%d) invalid\n",
02400                        match_bits, portal, libcfs_id2str(target),
02401                        md == NULL ? -1 : md->md_threshold);
02402                 if (md != NULL && md->md_me != NULL)
02403                         CERROR("REPLY MD also attached to portal %d\n",
02404                                md->md_me->me_portal);
02405 
02406                 lnet_res_unlock(cpt);
02407 
02408                 lnet_msg_free(msg);
02409                 return -ENOENT;
02410         }
02411 
02412         CDEBUG(D_NET, "LNetGet -> %s\n", libcfs_id2str(target));
02413 
02414         lnet_msg_attach_md(msg, md, 0, 0);
02415 
02416         lnet_prep_send(msg, LNET_MSG_GET, target, 0, 0);
02417 
02418         msg->msg_hdr.msg.get.match_bits = cpu_to_le64(match_bits);
02419         msg->msg_hdr.msg.get.ptl_index = cpu_to_le32(portal);
02420         msg->msg_hdr.msg.get.src_offset = cpu_to_le32(offset);
02421         msg->msg_hdr.msg.get.sink_length = cpu_to_le32(md->md_length);
02422 
02423         /* NB handles only looked up by creator (no flips) */
02424         msg->msg_hdr.msg.get.return_wmd.wh_interface_cookie =
02425                 the_lnet.ln_interface_cookie;
02426         msg->msg_hdr.msg.get.return_wmd.wh_object_cookie =
02427                 md->md_lh.lh_cookie;
02428 
02429         lnet_res_unlock(cpt);
02430 
02431         lnet_build_msg_event(msg, LNET_EVENT_SEND);
02432 
02433         rc = lnet_send(self, msg, LNET_NID_ANY);
02434         if (rc < 0) {
02435                 CNETERR("Error sending GET to %s: %d\n",
02436                         libcfs_id2str(target), rc);
02437                 lnet_finalize(NULL, msg, rc);
02438         }
02439 
02440         /* completion will be signalled by an event */
02441         return 0;
02442 }
02443 EXPORT_SYMBOL(LNetGet);
02444 
02459 int
02460 LNetDist(lnet_nid_t dstnid, lnet_nid_t *srcnidp, __u32 *orderp)
02461 {
02462         struct list_head        *e;
02463         struct lnet_ni          *ni;
02464         lnet_remotenet_t        *rnet;
02465         __u32                   dstnet = LNET_NIDNET(dstnid);
02466         int                     hops;
02467         int                     cpt;
02468         __u32                   order = 2;
02469         struct list_head        *rn_list;
02470 
02471         /* if !local_nid_dist_zero, I don't return a distance of 0 ever
02472          * (when lustre sees a distance of 0, it substitutes 0@lo), so I
02473          * keep order 0 free for 0@lo and order 1 free for a local NID
02474          * match */
02475 
02476         LASSERT (the_lnet.ln_refcount > 0);
02477 
02478         cpt = lnet_net_lock_current();
02479 
02480         list_for_each(e, &the_lnet.ln_nis) {
02481                 ni = list_entry(e, lnet_ni_t, ni_list);
02482 
02483                 if (ni->ni_nid == dstnid) {
02484                         if (srcnidp != NULL)
02485                                 *srcnidp = dstnid;
02486                         if (orderp != NULL) {
02487                                 if (LNET_NETTYP(LNET_NIDNET(dstnid)) == LOLND)
02488                                         *orderp = 0;
02489                                 else
02490                                         *orderp = 1;
02491                         }
02492                         lnet_net_unlock(cpt);
02493 
02494                         return local_nid_dist_zero ? 0 : 1;
02495                 }
02496 
02497                 if (LNET_NIDNET(ni->ni_nid) == dstnet) {
02498                         if (srcnidp != NULL)
02499                                 *srcnidp = ni->ni_nid;
02500                         if (orderp != NULL)
02501                                 *orderp = order;
02502                         lnet_net_unlock(cpt);
02503                         return 1;
02504                 }
02505 
02506                 order++;
02507         }
02508 
02509         rn_list = lnet_net2rnethash(dstnet);
02510         list_for_each(e, rn_list) {
02511                 rnet = list_entry(e, lnet_remotenet_t, lrn_list);
02512 
02513                 if (rnet->lrn_net == dstnet) {
02514                         lnet_route_t *route;
02515                         lnet_route_t *shortest = NULL;
02516                         __u32 shortest_hops = LNET_UNDEFINED_HOPS;
02517                         __u32 route_hops;
02518 
02519                         LASSERT(!list_empty(&rnet->lrn_routes));
02520 
02521                         list_for_each_entry(route, &rnet->lrn_routes,
02522                                             lr_list) {
02523                                 route_hops = route->lr_hops;
02524                                 if (route_hops == LNET_UNDEFINED_HOPS)
02525                                         route_hops = 1;
02526                                 if (shortest == NULL ||
02527                                     route_hops < shortest_hops) {
02528                                         shortest = route;
02529                                         shortest_hops = route_hops;
02530                                 }
02531                         }
02532 
02533                         LASSERT(shortest != NULL);
02534                         hops = shortest_hops;
02535                         if (srcnidp != NULL)
02536                                 *srcnidp = shortest->lr_gateway->lp_ni->ni_nid;
02537                         if (orderp != NULL)
02538                                 *orderp = order;
02539                         lnet_net_unlock(cpt);
02540                         return hops + 1;
02541                 }
02542                 order++;
02543         }
02544 
02545         lnet_net_unlock(cpt);
02546         return -EHOSTUNREACH;
02547 }
02548 EXPORT_SYMBOL(LNetDist);
